description: Custom designed for your precious Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Tablet, this case features a combination of functionality and style. Well built to protect your Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Tablet for the years to come.Ultra slim lightweight hardback adds minimal bulk while protecting your Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Tablet.The premium PU leather boosts a classy look.The no-scratch microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection.Built-in stand with two angles: perfect whenever you type an email or watch a movie.Access to all controls and features.Magnetic closure.This product is sold exclusively by BSCstore. Only buy from BSCstore to get genuine MoKo(TM) products with Lifetime warranty and superb customer service.
title: MoKo Amazon All-New Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Case - Ultra Slim Lightweight Smart-shell Stand Case for Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Inch 2013 Generation Tablet, GRAY
